name: Baby Shark Attack
description:
Everyone started somewhere.

Here is the first game I ever made, it couldn't be simpler.

Play as either a hungry shark or a defenseless swimmer.

Scoring:

Shark - Eating the swimmer or seals

Swimmer - Pick up the harpoon then stab the shark

Controls:

Shark - Arrow keys

Swimmer - WASD

Credits - James O'Connell
